title: Long queue times
body:
Just wondering how the queue system works because i've been sitting in a queue with a friend for over 10 minutes for draft pick, and we have watched as other people on our friends list have queued up and found a game within a few minutes. 
This isn't just a one off this happens all the time.

Ty

replies.body: I would imagine finding games at 1am aest would be slower than normal.

Yeah nah that was the last straw. Like I said this isn't a one off or anything, this happens during the day as well. And only just an hour ago i waited 11 minutes for a game. So yeah it's kinda bullshit
Playing normals - particularly draft pick - while ARURF is active on a weekday is also going to make queues longer.

half an hour waiting for a draft pick. then autofilled...
f* this.

iif i have another 10 minute or longer queue for blind pick or ARAM i'll actually be done with this game... used to live in europe and every queue would be at most 30 seconds... in ranked bronze silver or even platinum... been waiting often for like 20 minutes....

Queue times in OCE pre level 30 are shocking. I'm currently sitting in an ARURF queue right now. The estimation time is 3 minutes but it's been over 17 minutes already and it's 2 pm on a Sunday.

Maybe League is just dying in OCE, I don't know.

Great work Riot on fixing queue time, literally just sat in queue for over 26 minutes waiting for a game, and then they put me in support role when primary is Mid. Suggesting that you give priority to people who have been in queue longer for their positions.
Did someone know how much time I need to wait before long queue times it's removed from my account ????
same problem every queue time me and a friend get when we duo is 10+ minutes

I've had a number of 40 minute queues and even a 70 minute queue over the last few days. 
I think there may be a problem with the queues. I made a thread about it and a few people replied saying there was a problem with the queue causing long wait times

to be honest though I'm always surprised when I see people getting mad about 10 minute queue times. I've been playing League since beta and I've found 10 minute to be fairly normal. I usually get a time minute wait maybe 1 out 5 games
